text: Sir Nicholas Attygalle, KBE, FRCS, FRCOG (14 July 1894 â€“ 27 March 1970) was a Ceylonese academic, surgeon and a Senator. He was the President of the Senate of Ceylon from 1953 to 1960. He was the first Ceylonese Vice Chancellor of the University of Ceylon, where his nickname was "Iron Vice Chancellor". title: Nicholas Attygalle
